BloomForYou.title: Bloom for you
BloomForYou.description: The first game created using the Godot game engine. The project's goal was to test my skills in 2D game development. During the process, I received feedback and addressed several issues, which allowed me to improve the quality of subsequent projects.

BodyBirdsDrop.title: Body, Birds, Drop
BodyBirdsDrop.description: The game was developed with a focus on arcade-style gameplay and replayability. During the development process, skills in time management under tight deadlines were acquired.

Bunker.title: Bunker
Bunker.description: The goal of developing the game was to create a complete project in 3 days with a focus on utilizing the game engine's physics. Feedback was received from players and streamers during the process.

ColorsLab.title: ColorsLab
ColorsLab.description: An experimental game using custom shaders, part of the game logic was implemented at the shader level.

DeliveryExpress.title: DeliveryExpress
DeliveryExpress.description: The first game was made and completed using the Unity game engine. It's a simple arcade game with a level system and delivery.
